data.text: I had a wonderful stay at the Rove Healthcare City Hotel from yesterday until today. The customer service was excellent, especially from the front desks agents Vikram and Ishan. When I had a problem with my things, they were incredibly helpful and solved it in a positive and efficient manner. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Dubai!
data.title: The best Hotel in Dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello Rover, We're absolutely thrilled to hear that you have enjoyed your short staycation with us @ Rove Healthcare City! Vikram and Ishan are our very own superheroes, swooping in to save the day with their extraordinary skill powers! üí´ They're like Batman and Robin, but with better suits. 
Thanks a million for sailing by and sharing your jolly good experience! We can't wait to welcome you back aboard again for another Roving round!‚öìÔ∏è

#Happy Roving
Ayman & Team
owner_response.author: Ayman Raafat

data.text: I had an amazing iftar at Rove, It was a really enjoyable experience and it was really memorable. The food was delicious and amazing overall a 10/10 experience and would definitely love to go again would definitely recommend i loved it and miss it already haha.
data.title: I had a really fun time which will always be memorable to me

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Rover Aqsaa, 

We are really overjoyed to hear that your iftar experience was nothing short of amazing! 
Creating lasting memories is what we are always aiming for, and we're delighted to know that your time with us was truly memorable.

Thank you for your heartfelt recommendation, and we can't wait to welcome you back for another unforgettable Roving round with us soon.

#Happy Roving!
Ayman & Team
owner_response.author: Ayman Raafat

data.text:
Beautiful stay...staffs are welcoming evey boody was nice to us . Clean linens,  lots of amienties 247 when ever we need just calling the reception 
Pool side also is amazing and clean: and we will recommend to our family and friends:  

Thanks everyone
data.title: Peaceful and relaxing

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hala Rover Masrook!

Thanks a bunch for Roving with us and for your stellar review!

We are thrilled to hear that you had a blast Roving with our awesome Rovesters and enjoying our top-notch amenities. 

Our Rovesters are always here to ensure you have a splendid Roving experience, 247!

We cannot wait to have you back for another round of Roving fun,

#HappyRoving,

data.text: We were walk in guests at The Daily and it was fully booked but still they accommodate us and gave us table. Atta and Rohab were very welcoming they made sure we feel comfortable since we're not sitting inside the restaurant. It's a great iftar experience.
data.title: Iftar at The Daily

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Rover Sophia!

Thanks for sharing your Roving experience with us! 

We're thrilled to hear that Atta and Rohab made your iftar at The Daily a memorable one. 

Let's #RoveItUp Together Again! 

Ramadan and Rove Team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Ramadan

data.text: We had after Iftar here. This is our 4th Iftar but first time in this branch. The restaurant is smaller but had great food selections. The staffs were very friendly and welcoming. Special thanks to Attia & Rohab, Rajesha and Isham, such a lovely team.
data.title: Iftar

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hi Rover laramhay!

We're thrilled you chose to Rove with us for your Iftar adventure! 

Attia, Rohab, Rajesha, and Isham are beaming with joy knowing they made your experience memorable. 

Can't wait to welcome you back,

Ramadan and Rove Team
owner_response.author: Mohamed Ramadan
